name: MagicalGirl Mimi
description:
Girls fight with magic!
It`s a shooting action game!
Defeat ghosts with magical power.

The game is easy to operate.
You can play with direction button and two buttons.
Please see the following for the operation method.



Direction: move
X: Attack
A: crouch



Feature:
・Pixel Art
・Smooth animation
・magic
・Action games
・16 bit graphics
